text: [Ej mu'minon] Ojo pindostaed, ki voridi ʙihist mesaved, hol on ki hanuz monandi on ci ʙar [sari] pesinijoni sumo omad, ʙar [sari] sumo naomadaast? Dusvori va zijon ʙa eson rasid va [on cunon saxti kasidand va] ʙa larza aftodand, ki pajomʙar va kasone, ki ʙo u imon ovarda ʙudand, guftand: "Jorii Alloh taolo kaj faro xohad rasid"? Ogoh ʙosed! Be tardid jorii Alloh taolo nazdik ast
